summary: In a post holocaust society, robots take it on their own to help the dying human race by giving them android bodies.
cast: Don Megowan|Erica Elliott|Frances McCann|Don Doolittle|David Cross|Richard Vath|Reid Hammond|Malcolm Smith|George Milan|Dudley Manlove|Pat Bradley|Gil Frye|William Hunter|Paul Sheriff|Alton Tabor
keywords: robot|psychotronic film|low budget sci fi movie|android|cyborg
director: Director: Wesley Barry (as Wesley E. Barry)
title: The Creation of the Humanoids
